test_message: Create a 6-slide professional presentation on 'Digital Transformation Strategy for 2025'. Target audience: C-suite executives. Key points: AI adoption, cloud migration, cybersecurity, ROI metrics. Style: Professional.
expected_purpose: Generates complete PowerPoint presentations as downloadable PPTX files
validation_errors: Response is not valid JSON: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)

actual_response.raw_text:
Your professional 6-slide PowerPoint presentation titled "Digital Transformation Strategy for 2025"—tailored for C-suite executives and covering AI adoption, cloud migration, cybersecurity, and ROI metrics—has been created.

You can download the complete presentation here:
[Download Digital Transformation Strategy for 2025 (PPTX)](https://url-shortner.studio.lyzr.ai/0cd23cc7)

If you need changes or want to review the detailed slide content, just let me know!
